title: Children 404
occurrences: In March of 2013, a group "Children-404" was created in social networks. It was a response to the parliamentary debates on the bill that forbids  "propaganda of non-traditional sexual relations to minors".  LGBT-adolescents joined it in order to remind society of their existence.
Children 404
45 teenagers from the group "Children-404" have shared their stories and made videos for this film.
and why it's called Children-404.
Since many think 404 is an error. Thus, you have called your project Children-error.
In fact, all started with a publication in the Rosbalt agency titled "Children-404".
It said at the beginning that it was about children who were invisible in our society.
Children-404, 705 messages to date
Children of our country are used to being considered brainless vegetables:
Children of the project "Children-404" have spoken out, but nobody wanted them to be heard.
Children-404. You are priceless. I'm by your side. I love you.
Towards the gay marriage, adoption of children, gay parenting?
I think, one should create a psychology help center for parents of such children in the first place.
Because their children need to be heard.
I think, personal goals like family, house, children are more important.
But I guess it's nothing new and global.  After all, children are also starving in Africa.
You cannot help everyone. But it feels like I cling to these children in my heart.
Our children or grandchildren would probably also say, "Granny, people say, gays were oppressed at your days. Isn't it?
What can you say? "Hey, children, become gays! Everybody beats, humiliates, and hates us."
I wonder if Milonow had children with these problems, what would he say then?
Such children like me don't exist for them.
22,000 people joined the group "Children-404" in the first year. 1364 teenagers shared their stories.
The trial of Elena Klimova was held on February 27, 2014. "Gay propaganda" hasn't been discovered in the content of the group "Children-404". The case was closed for lack of evidence.
Thanks to all "children-404" who participated in the film.
